sub_title: Global Head -Sustainability and Circular Economy Consulting and Transformation at TCS Pace ☑️Strategy Disruption  Digital Carbon Neutrality,💲Business Model  🏆Agile Coach
summary:
Nirmalya Banerjee, I am an accomplished Business Leader with  23+ years of consulting and leadership experience. My professional experience has enabled me to ⭐️  balance organizational objectives, ⭐️  Incubate new Business models for customers, ⭐️  Design and Implement Sustainability strategy towards Carbon Neutrality ⭐️  strategising and recommending ways to achieve and maintain a competitive business edge. I have an impeccable record of delivering more than💲 1.5 B  EBITDA benefits and incubating more than💲 30B new business opportunities.

🏆 Head - Innovation and Sustainability for Manufacturing & Utility Industries at TCS
🏆 Managing Partner & Head of Process Industry Consulting Practice at TCS
🏆 Leading TCS Pace as a Catalyst path breaking Innovations and Business Model disruptions for clients
🏆 Spearheading Innovation and Digital Transformation programs for large Multinationals towards Growth and Transformation vision.

Key Highlights from my consulting experience:
✅  Managed💲 Profit & Loss on a global scale demonstrating 6x growth 
✅  Helped companies radically reduce carbon footprint leveraging digital tools and new ecosystem
✅  Helped companies establish 3 golden steps for Circular Economy - Strategy, Business Model and Ecosystem 
✅  Delivered transformational results across 100+ leading organizations across industries
✅  Facilitated companies to incubate Innovations and design new disruptive business models towards non-linear growth
✅  Published more than 30 White-Papers as a Thought Leader
✅  Delivered more than 20 keynote speeches at various leading industry events

☀️Industries:
Chemicals, Information Technology (IT), CPG, Retail, E-Commerce, Life sciences, Food & Nutrition, Paints & Coatings, Construction & Building Materials, Automotive, Industrial Manufacturing, Logistics, Energy & Utilities, Oil & Gas

☀️ Business Skills: 
Strategy, Innovation, Design Thinking, Leadership Coaching, Business Model Design, Digital Transformation, AI Strategy, Cognitive Automation, Operational Excellence, Enterprise Agile, Business Transformation, Lean Six Sigma, Project Coaching,CX Transformation, Sustainability, Growth Hacking, Service Design, Continuous Improvement, Project Management, Marketing, Technology Incubation, Benchmarking

☀️ Interpersonal Skills: 
Agile Leadership, Change Management, Stakeholder Engagement, System Thinking, Empathy, Communications, Team Building, Cross-Functional Team Leadership, Conflict Management, Creating Shared Value, Building Client Relationships, Active Listening, Risk Mitigation, Problem Solving, Servant Leadership

awards.title: Lean Six Sigma Europe and UK Group Manager Award
awards.description:
We are joining together to network, to learn, to develop business, Jobs, careers, certification opportunities, to participate in best practice sharing, and maintain & build new relationships.

We are a global community, uniting all White Belt (WB), Yellow Belt (YB), Green Belt (GB), Project Managers (PM), Black Belt (BB), Master Back Belt (MBB), Project Sponsor (PS), Deployment Champion (DC), Executive Leader (EL), Kaizen Practitioner or Facilitator or Lean Master, Auditors, Continuous Improvement, Management Consultants, Program Managers, Business Owners, Students, Professors, & Engineers.

We are Lean Six Sigma Professionals, Practitioners, & students of Lean Six Sigma, Lean, Six Sigma, Operational Excellence, TQPI, Business Process Management, business analyst, BPM, Kaizen, TPS, Project Management, Change Management, Strategy, Supply Chain, Innovation, Quality Control, ISO, SCOR, TRIZ, Theory of Constraints, ToC, ITIL, CMMI, Malcolm Baldrige, TQM, Total Quality Management, Industrial Engineers, BPM, & Process Excellence.

We are a central hub for author’s books, articles, white papers, podcasts, blogs, events and conferences. Consultants, and thought leaders are visiting regularly to support members in projects, productivity, training, skills development, coaching, mentoring, financials, statistical software, simulation, teams, organizational development, and more…. We practice in every Industry and have private subgroups for special topics such as Healthcare, Private Sector, Jobs, BPM, Information Technology, Kaizen, & Operational Excellence

profile_positions.title: Managing Partner - Innovation and Transformation Group

profile_positions.description:
Organizational head of Dr. Mikel J Harry Six Sigma Management Institute in Belgium, Netherlands, and Luxemburg. Fostering adoption of Lean Six Sigma by Industries, Governments, and Academia towards 'Organizational Excellence' and Skill Development. 

Dr. Mikel J Harry Six Sigma Management Institute Europe is the only organization in Europe offering Lean Six Sigma Belt BOK including 1500+ training videos and 100+resource material personally designed and delivered by Dr. Mikel J Harry and credentials /certifications directly from the Co-founder of "Six Sigma" Dr Mikel J Harry (www.mikeljharry.com).
profile_positions.title: Director - BeNeLux

company.name: Six Sigma Management Institute by Dr. Mikel J. Harry

profile_positions.company: Six Sigma Management Institute by Dr. Mikel J. Harry
profile_positions.description:
Experts in Lean Six Sigma Training, Consulting, and Deployments targeting Breakthrough in Business Transformation, Optimization and Business Terraforming

The Dr. Mikel J. Harry® Six Sigma Management Institute "SSMI" is the leading innovator of Six Sigma methodologies in the world. Specializing in research and development of Lean Six Sigma and process improvement educational curriculum, delivery systems, supporting tools and resources that produce operational excellence.

One of SSMI's main objectives was to develop effective delivery methods so that the cost of training could be drastically reduced, making Six Sigma affordable for individuals and businesses of all sizes.  SSMI released MindPro®4.0, the most comprehensive Six Sigma training system in the world. As an online training and coaching platform, MindPro®4.0 provides an extremely flexible, self-paced elearning with a certification program. 

SSMI offerings include Master Black Belt, Black Belt, Green Belt, and Yellow Belt training courses delivered in a virtual blended model combined with mentoring that optimizes student learning.  Additional options include onsite, custom, and workshops designed to enhance the skills needed to build careers not just jobs for professionals.  Other areas include strategy, quality, leadership, employment, Kaizen, Agile, project and change management.
profile_positions.title: Lean Six Sigma BeNeLux Regional Partner

company.name: Dr. Mikel J Harry Six Sigma Management Institute Asia

profile_positions.company: Dr. Mikel J Harry Six Sigma Management Institute Asia
profile_positions.description:
"Dr. Mikel J Harry Six Sigma Management Institute Asia" (also known as "Six Sigma Asia") – "SSMI Asia" is the only institute in Asia offering an avenue for lean six sigma practitioners to obtain their LSS Belt credentials/certifications directly from the Co-founder of Six Sigma & National Best-selling Author - Dr. Mikel J Harry (www.mikeljharry.com) and gain access to 1500+ training videos and 100+resource material personally designed and delivered by Dr. Mikel J Harry.  The Lean Six Sigma credentials/certifications that’s offered by SSMI Asia include;
•	Lean Six Sigma Black Belt, 
•	Lean Six Sigma Green Belt (Service/Commercial), 
•	Lean Six Sigma Green Belt (Manufacturing/Industrial), 
•	Lean Six Sigma Yellow Belt, 
•	Diagnostic Practices, 
•	The Great Discovery Programme (www.thegreatdiscovery.com )  - a proven way of thinking to greatly  increase your odds of success - in your work life, personal life and home life using Lean Six Sigma way of thinking 
•	Quality Tools and more…

Asia being the fastest growing economy in the world, we believe, SSMI Asia - is an essential next step for the longevity and increased relevance of Lean Six Sigma to generate increased velocity of value by nurturing its goodness in the purest form. "SSMI Asia" also manages "Six Sigma Asia" (SSA) – "www.sixsigmaasia.org" one of Asia’s largest LinkedIn communities dedicated to provide a gathering space for all the practitioners in the field to share their thoughts & ideas, related events and job posts. The forum is managed independently and open to all Lean Six Sigma enthusiast in the Asian region.
profile_positions.title: Lean Six Sigma Regional Partner

company.name: Dr. Mikel J. Harry Six Sigma Management Institute Europe

profile_positions.company: Dr. Mikel J. Harry Six Sigma Management Institute Europe
profile_positions.description:
The Six Sigma Management Institute was founded by Dr. Mikel J. Harry, the main architect of Six Sigma and an international expert in this field. After 35 years of successful practice, his competency-based knowledge was used to design and develop world-class training programs. 

Lean and Six Sigma methodologies are the most breakthrough management strategies that any company can undertake. Trained individuals will not only acquire practical skills to solve highly profitable business issues but also engage the same problem-solving philosophy adopted by the most successful companies in the world. 

The Six Sigma Management Institute is committed to providing the highest quality Lean Six Sigma training programs, all of which are deliver by the most respected authority in the field, Dr. Mikel J. Harry. 

All the materials submitted are no doubt sufficient to demonstrate our high level of knowledge and the scope of our company. Six Sigma Management seeks to maintain the high standing of its brand throughout the entire world, in particular in Europe, which is our key market. For this reason, the European division of the SSMI, managed by Fabrizio Majorana, was created. 

The core business of the SSMI by Mikel J. Harry is the research, application and continuous development of the method itself. The SSMI is indeed the only firm to have successfully crossed the borders of the canonical process and product in all areas of business. This method also covers the private sphere of personal well-being through "The Great Discovery"​ project, the business management sphere through the "Velocity of Value"​ program applied to financial aspects, and also boasts the creation of a new figure, EMBB (Executive Master Black Belt).

Trident Group is a USD 1 billion Indian business conglomerate and global player. Headquartered in Ludhiana, Punjab, Trident is the largest terry towel and wheat straw based paper manufacturer in the world. With the establishment of state-of-the-art manufacturing processes and systems coupled with appropriate human capital and credentials, Trident has frequently received accolades from its patrons in recognition for delivering high quality standards and for its customer-centric approach.

The Company operates in two major business segments: Textiles and Paper with its manufacturing facilities located in Punjab and Madhya Pradesh. Trident’s customer base spans over more than 75 countries across 6 continents and comprises of global retail brands like Ralph Lauren, Calvin Klein, JC Penney, IKEA, Target, Wal-Mart, Macy's, Kohl's, Sears, Sam's Club, Burlington, etc.
profile_positions.title: Manager Business Excellence

profile_positions.description:
•	Managed INR 45 Billion Project for 550 MW Power Plant 
•	Developed a model which helped to optimize generation cost by working on over 120 variables 
•	Trained Staffs and implemented TOC principles at Torrent Cables

Torrent Power is one of the leading brands in the Indian power sector. With an all-round experience in generation, transmission and distribution of power, and a proven track record of implementing large power projects, Torrent Power is the most experienced private sector player in Gujarat.

Torrent Power has a generation capacity of 3253 MW and distributes over 15 billion units of power annually to Ahmedabad, Gandhinagar, Surat, Dahej, Bhiwandi and Agra. Its advanced technology and efficient operations have enabled it to reduce T&D losses to approx. 6.54% in the license area, which is the lowest in the country.

And for over 2.87 million consumers in these cities, Torrent Power has evolved into a lifeline that continues to empower their lives - uninterrupted.

company.name: International Standard for Lean Six Sigma (ISLSS)

volunteer_experiences.description:
We are joining together to network, to learn, to develop business, Jobs, careers, certification opportunities, to participate in best practice sharing, and maintain & build new relationships.

We are a global community, uniting all White Belt (WB), Yellow Belt (YB), Green Belt (GB), Project Managers (PM), Black Belt (BB), Master Back Belt (MBB), Project Sponsor (PS), Deployment Champion (DC), Executive Leader (EL), Kaizen Practitioner or Facilitator or Lean Master, Auditors, Continuous Improvement, Management Consultants, Program Managers, Business Owners, Students, Professors, & Engineers.

We are Lean Six Sigma Professionals, Practitioners, & students of Lean Six Sigma, Lean, Six Sigma, Operational Excellence, TQPI, Business Process Management, business analyst, BPM, Kaizen, TPS, Project Management, Change Management, Strategy, Supply Chain, Innovation, Quality Control, ISO, SCOR, TRIZ, Theory of Constraints, ToC, ITIL, CMMI, Malcolm Baldrige, TQM, Total Quality Management, Industrial Engineers, BPM, & Process Excellence.

We are a central hub for author’s books, articles, white papers, podcasts, blogs, events and conferences. Consultants, and thought leaders are visiting regularly to support members in projects, productivity, training, skills development, coaching, mentoring, financials, statistical software, simulation, teams, organizational development, and more…. We practice in every Industry and have private subgroups for special topics such as Healthcare, Private Sector, Jobs, BPM, Information Technology, Kaizen, & Operational Excellence

About Global Registry
The Global Lean Six Sigma Registry (GLSSR) was started in 2004 with the mission to satisfy a pervasive industry need for an archive of Lean Six Sigma practitioners and to validate that certificate holders held a level of understanding that was commensurate with the level of Belt certification they were claiming. The GLSSR has more 675,000 members and is the largest Lean Six Sigma Certification Registry in the world

Significant Updates
The GLSSR Board made significant updates to the Registry in 2020 by creating four levels of Membership:

Learner Level where members receive the GLSSR Newsletter and are kept up to date on Lean Six Sigma activities.

Declared Level where Belt Certificate holders can create a digital archive of their Lean Six Sigma Belt Certificates distribute a “share code” which allows them to share their profile with current and potential employers, and others whom they wish to share their information.

Authorized Level where Belt Holders can validate and update their understanding of the Lean Six Sigma Body of Knowledge through examination and updated Lean Six Sigma Philosophy training.

Practitioner Level where Belt Holders can archive their experience by providing an executive summary of their projects and complete a questionnaire which will score their project using the GLSSR proprietary scoring system.

GLSSR Board Members serve a three-year term that may be renewed. Board Members remain anonymous during the time they are actively serving on the board.

E-mail me for any questions or feedback: info@glssregistry.com
